problem_text_cn: 如图,l_{1}∥l_{2}∥l_{3},直线AC、DF这与三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．已知AB=1,BC=3,DE=2,则EF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, l_{N_0}∥ l_{N_1}∥ l_{N_2}, the straight lines AC and DF intersect with three parallel lines at points A, B, C and points D, E, and F respectively. Knowing that AB = N_3, BC = N_4, DE = N_5, then the length of EF is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查平行线分线段成比例,解答本题的关键是明确题意,找出所求问题需要的条件,利用平行线分线段成比例解答．
